content: *keep your toes toasty all winter long in these quick knitting slipper socks lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 1200 corrections applied *latest pdf file was modified february 22 2010* skill level intermediate level 3 size small/medium large 1x s/m fits size 6-8 adult foot l fits size 9-10 adult foot xl fits size 11-12 adult foot wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 2 balls double-pointed needles - size 10
